Can you heal monsters in adventure?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Can you heal monsters in adventure?
By Evolution75 on Sunday, May 14, 2006 - 05:52 pm:

in MR4 as you walked your monsters got more health but you lost energy but since there isn't energy in this game is there any way to heal them?

By mayhem on Sunday, May 14, 2006 - 08:36 pm:

the energy is just a measure of stamina on the adventure. They get a new alotment of energy on each adventure. don't let it run completely dry or it will shorten the lifespan of the monster. The alotment becomes greater as the monster gets older and stronger and more monster give you a greater total.

By Evolution75 on Monday, May 15, 2006 - 12:48 pm:

that still doesn't answer my question can you heal monsters in adventure mode because i always die in the first adventure of the second town

By kilak on Monday, May 15, 2006 - 02:00 pm:

not that I have found

in colno (dark forest) at the very end there is a glowing area that if you hit x it will heal one monster to full but this is only helpful when you go through it the first time as after the story the boss is not there.

By mayhem on Monday, May 15, 2006 - 05:28 pm:

you heal monsters by walking around. The only other way is by life sucking attacks and the pixie has a heal "attack" I think a couple others might as well. just hope you don't run into random encounters. If you can't handle it right away raise your monsters more, this is a monster rancher game.

And yeah I just realized this should be in the mr4 archive. If you have other questions they may already be answered there.

By mayhem on Monday, May 15, 2006 - 06:01 pm:

sorry I'm an idiot forget me I didn't read the post clearly.

The answer is no.

By TrouBlez_456321 on Thursday, April 19, 2007 - 05:03 pm:

Yeah you can't heal a monster on adventures except for the 1st adventure where there is a "Small Lake" that you can heal a monster that is out in field

EX: YOUR MONSTERS ON YOUR ADVENTURE

PIRORO (out in field) GOLEM RIPPER

PIRORO is with you that means PIRORO will be healed
